remarks: A pair collection is disjoint iff the two sets in the family have empty intersection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
statement:

disjprg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ A =/= B ) -> ( Disj_ x e. { A , B } C <-> ( D i^i E ) = (/) ) ) $.
